title: Antifungal Drug Repurposing Analysis

summary.original_hypothesis: Antifungals have anti-inflammatory properties for repurposing
summary.actual_finding: High precision comes from CORRECT fungal indications, not repurposing

key_findings: Antifungal high precision is from CORRECT fungal-disease relationships, not repurposing
Model correctly learns: Fluconazole → cryptococcosis, Amphotericin B → invasive aspergillosis
Seborrheic dermatitis hits are valid: caused by Malassezia yeast
Oropharynx cancer hits: fungal prophylaxis context, not anti-cancer repurposing
Autoimmune predictions (0% precision) are FALSE POSITIVES
conclusion: Original hypothesis INVALIDATED. The model correctly predicts antifungal-fungal relationships but does NOT identify anti-inflammatory repurposing opportunities.
